content: Thanks for the shopping tips! I'll definitely keep those in mind. And yeah, I'm really looking forward to editing my GoPro footage from the beach trip. It was such a great experience, and I'm sure the footage will bring back some awesome memories. By the way, since we're on the topic of shopping, I've been thinking about getting some new gear for my trip to Tokyo. Do you have any recommendations for electronic stores in Shinjuku where I can find some good deals?
